title: Adaptive Learning Design for Personalized Mathematics Proficiency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Mathematical Concepts (Higher Education Level) and Fundamental Job-Related Problem-Solving Skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning tools with individualized pacing, emphasizing job-related problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Identify mathematical weaknesses with 90% accuracy through individual diagnostic assessments
Provide 50+ customized practice questions at learner-specific levels using an adaptive question-generation system
Supports learners to implement personalized study plans at over 80% completion within two weeks through learning progress monitoring
Over 85% of examinees demonstrate improved ability to solve job-related mathematical problems in the final assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
